text: Steal Yer Heart ia an album released by The Briefs on October 18, 2005. It was the first album recorded with Kicks on bass. ==Track listing== #Genital General #Criminal Youth #Move Too Slow #Lint Fabrik #Getting Hit on at the Bank #Stuck on You #I Can't Work #Can't Get Through #My Girl (Wants to Be a Zombie) #Normal Jerks #Forty and Above #Razorblade Heart == Weblinks == * == References == Category:2005 albums Category:The Briefs albums Category:BYO Records albums
title: Steal Yer Heart
